name: Programming Hero
description: Programming Hero is a fun and interactive way to learn programming. Whether you're a beginner or looking to brush up your skills, this app makes learning to code exciting and practical.

reviews.comment: Best app for beginners! The lessons are super easy to follow and engaging.

name: Notion
description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace where you can write, plan, and get organized. It’s perfect for personal productivity and team collaboration.

reviews.comment: Replaced all my productivity apps. It’s so flexible!

name: Duolingo
description: Learn a new language with fun, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build vocabulary and grammar skills.

reviews.comment: Learning Spanish has never been this fun and addictive!

name: Trello
description: Trello lets you work more collaboratively and get more done. Boards, lists, and cards enable you to organize and prioritize your projects.

name: Clash Royale
description: Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales.

reviews.comment: Intense and strategic. Can't stop playing!

name: Khan Academy
description: Free educational resources for students, teachers, and lifelong learners. Subjects include math, science, history, and more.

reviews.comment: Lifesaver during exams. Best free learning resource.

name: Among Us
description: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal! Play online or over local WiFi.

reviews.comment: Playing with friends is so much fun. Who’s the imposter?!

name: Forest
description: Stay focused and plant trees! Forest helps you beat phone addiction and manage your time in a fun and sustainable way.

reviews.comment: Visually rewarding and keeps me productive. Great concept!
